snippet: GOLDBERG--Eugene, 1930-2016. The staff and management of Case Paper Co. today mourn the passing of Eugene Goldberg and send our deepest condolences to his family, friends, and colleagues. For over 40 years, Gene was a sales representative, and later Vice President of Sales at the company, leading the first generation of leadership to today's third generation. Almost every sales- person who has been with Case Paper for more than 25 years (and there are many) will credit Gene with his success. He led by example and infused his leadership with enthusiasm, wisdom, and joy. We are grateful for Gene's commitment to his colleagues and to Case Paper; his legacy endures to this day in the wonderful people he mentored and in the company's ongoing success. 1/3
